text:

name: NBCNews
text: The majority of the thousands of demonstrators at a protest against police violence marched peacefully on Saturday in Paris, but a small group clashed with police after smashing shop windows and setting 2 cars, a motorcycle and a cafe on fire. https://t.co/xjH9US19d9

name: NBCNews
text: San Francisco imposes new stay-at-home orders. The new restrictions, most scheduled to go into effect at noon Sunday, include the full closure of indoor portions of places of worship, movie theaters, gyms, museums, aquariums, and zoos. https://t.co/9SywgcM4Ja

text: Vanderbilt University senior Sarah Fuller makes history as the first woman to play in a Power 5 football game. https://t.co/NdzHYIXoVx

name: NBCNews
text: President Trump is threatening to veto legislation to fund the military as one of his final acts in office unless a widely supported, bipartisan provision to rename military bases honoring Confederate military leaders is removed, sources say. https://t.co/10qcOy2BIE
